title: Missions & Characters
description: Deep dive into the world of spies, assassins, and telepaths!

questions.question: Who is the target of Operation Strix?
questions.explanation: Donovan Desmond is the chairman of the National Unity Party and the main target Twilight must get close to!

questions.question: Franky is Loid's informant who helps him with various missions.
questions.explanation: Franky Franklin is a skilled informant who assists Twilight with intelligence gathering and gadgets!

questions.question: What does Anya call her favorite TV show's main character?
questions.explanation: Anya loves the spy cartoon 'Spy Wars' and its hero Bondman - which influences her view of her father!

questions.question: What organization does Yor work for as an assassin?
questions.explanation: Yor works for the underground assassination organization known as 'Garden'!

questions.question: Damian Desmond has a secret crush on Anya.
questions.explanation: Despite acting like he dislikes her, Damian has developed feelings for Anya - much to his embarrassment!

questions.question: What is the spy agency that Loid works for?
questions.explanation: WISE (Westalis Intelligence Services Eastern-Focused Division) is the spy organization Twilight works for!

questions.question: What punishment marks do students receive at Eden Academy for bad behavior?
questions.explanation: Tonitrus Bolts are punishment marks - if a student gets 8, they're expelled from Eden Academy!

questions.question: Handler is Loid's superior in WISE.
questions.explanation: Sylvia Sherwood, codename 'Handler', is Twilight's superior who assigns him missions and provides support!
